name: Commissioned Crews
desc:
Commission bonuses are always applied when you enter a market. 

However... as a last resort, when activated, this ship will receive special training or upgrades varying from the faction you're commissioned under.

name: Commissioned Crew Ban
desc: This ship will be marked to never accept any future Commission Bonus. This does not allow any current Commission Bonus to be retained.
short: Deattach the ship's hull with the commissioned crew first!

name: Hegemonic Plating
desc: The ship receives more efficient armor plating and engineering. Increase the ship's armor by %s/%s/%s/%s points, depending on hull size.

name: Pristine Restoration
desc: A valued specimen of the original 14th Domain Battlegroup cannot simply be given a more refined armor plating and engineering. However, it can be maintained and polished from its current state to a more pristine state. This ship ignores the bonus of Hegemonic Plating and instead increase the ship's armor by %s.

name: League Manufactory
desc: The ship's manufactory has been improved based on Kazeron's designs. Increases the rate at which fighters refit by %s/%s/%s/%s, depending on hull size.

name: Tri-Tech Assistant
desc: Ships used by Tri-Tachyon are often refitted with specialized Tri-Tach software that boost flux capacity, but are only compatible with ships of %s and %s design types.

name: Experimental Flux Storage
desc: This software have experimental methods of storing flux in the workings of flux capaciators. Increases the ship's flux capacity by %s/%s/%s/%s, depending on hull size.

name: Lion Training
desc: The ship's crews have been trained and constantly drilled on Sindrian doctrines. Receive additional bonuses when an Officer is on-board this ship. Increase the ship's maneuverability by %s. Increases the turn rate of all turrets by %s.

name: Lion's Eye
desc: The leadership of a Timid or Cautious officer grants the ship the ability to take -%s damage taken by shields.

name: Lion's Mane
desc: The leadership of a Steady officer increase the ship's maneuverability by %s and increases the turn rate of all turrets by %s.

name: Lion's Maul
desc: The leadership of an Aggressive or Reckless officer grants the ship the ability to dish out +%s damage to shields.

name: Pirate Handiworks
desc: Pirates and smugglers on-board makes constant adjustments to make the ship less visible in space. The ship's sensor profile is reduced by %s.

name: PRISINE RESTORATIN
desc: Ochre Jane was one of the admirals of the Fourteenth Battlegroup. A failed mutiny in the Battlegroup and spending several time in a group of damaged cryopod as punishment led to a brain damaged Jane. Despite her brain damage, Jane did not lose her sense of strategy or lust for power embodying this sense in her Mk.XIV lines of ships that she commands. This ship gains an increase of armor by %s and flux characteristics by %s.

name: Blessing of Ludd
desc: Each missiles is individually blessed by Ludd. Ludd confers a %s hitpoint and %s/%s/%s/%s damage bonus of all missiles, rockets, bombs, and torpedos, depending on hull size.

name: The Path
desc: Pathers have destined a path for this ship and the ship will be modified in His name! Increases the ship's top speed in combat by %s/%s/%s/%s su/second, depending on hull size and reduce the time required to repair disabled weapons and engines (in combat) by %s.

name: United We Stand
desc:
"Then join hand in hand, brave Perseans all, by uniting we stand, by dividing we fall. In so righteous a cause let us hope to succeed and let none that oppose us stand in our way."

Receive commissioned bonuses from allied factions. Must redock at a market to reapply.
